articles.title: OPPO Reno 7 series is launching in India this week - XDA Developers
articles.description: OPPO India today revealed that the Reno 7 series is launching in India in early February. The launch event will take place on February 4.
articles.content: In November last year, OPPO unveiled the Reno 7 series, consisting of the Reno 7, Reno 7 Pro, and Reno 7 SE. At the time, the new lineup was limited to the Chinese market, with no word on subsequent … [+1977 chars]

articles.title: SpaceX aborts rocket mission 33 seconds before launch after a cruise liner sailed close to the launch site - Business Insider India
articles.description: SpaceX delayed a rocket launch half a minute before takeoff after a ship entered the hazard zone. Elon Musk's company said it will try to launch the Falcon
articles.content:
Elon Musk's SpaceX called off its latest rocket mission 33 seconds before takeoff after a cruise liner came too near to the launch site.
"Hold, hold, hold," an operator announced on SpaceX's live we… [+1274 chars]

articles.title: Mulayam Singh Yadav blesses Smriti Irani as she touches his feet in Parliament | WATCH - India Today
articles.description: Samajwadi Party (SP) veteran Mulayam Singh Yadav was seen blessing Union Minister Smriti Irani as she touched his feet in Parliament on the first day of the Budget session on Monday.

articles.author: New York Times
articles.title: ‘Stealth’ variant no cause for alarm, but could slow Covid-19 case decline - The Indian Express
articles.description: A new variant of the Omicron family, BA.2, doesn’t appear to cause more severe disease, and vaccines are just as effective against it as they are against other forms of omicron. But it does show signs of spreading more readily.
articles.content:
In recent days, headlines about a stealth omicron variant have conjured the notion that a villainous new form of the coronavirus is secretly creating a disastrous new wave of Covid-19.
That scenario… [+4486 chars]

articles.title: Apple Macs may soon get iPhone's precise-location UWB technology - India Today
articles.description: Ultra wideband, or UWB, is a short-range wireless communication technology that is used for location awareness by Apple devices such as iPhone, Apple Watch, and AirTags.

articles.title: This is where James Webb Telescope will look at for the first time in space - India Today
articles.description: Webb is designed to peer back over 13.5 billion years to capture infrared light from celestial objects, with much higher resolution than ever before, and to study our own solar system as well as distant worlds.
